events.inlineCode:
runtimeScene.getVariables().get("CAMERA_STACK").setValue(1)
const MAIN = runtimeScene.getLayer().getRenderer().getRendererObject().parent
const ISOMETRIC = runtimeScene.getVariables().get("CAMERA_STACK").getValue() == 1 ? true : false
const LAYER = runtimeScene.getLayer()
window.MAIN = MAIN
window.LAYER = LAYER

MAIN.scale.y = 0.5
MAIN.pivot.y = -((LAYER.getCameraHeight()*LAYER.getCameraZoom())/2)

eventsFunctions.name: XYCollision
eventsFunctions.sentence: Create XYSort Collision at _PARAM1_, from _PARAM2_ on group _PARAM3_; Debug: _PARAM4_

eventsBasedBehaviors.description:
Variables:
[ _z ] Z axis value (ex: 100, -20) |
[ _x ] real X position |
[ _y ] real Y position | 
modify _x, _y value to move projected sprite
